card.title: A company specializing in automotive and motorsports
card.sub_title: Conducting business in various fields within the automobile industry, such as planning and operations of motorsports competitions and various events of auto-related companies and manufacturers.​

game.title1: As a game changer of the domestic auto-industry,
game.title2: we are a young and innovative company ​
game.title3: that strives introduce new life into this sphere,
game.contents1: Automanix is subsidiary of Dunamu, founder of the nation's largest digital assets exchange.
game.contents2: In 2021, we hosted the AMX eSports Championship,
game.contents3: the nation's largest e-sports racing competition.
game.contents4: Based on the spirit of challenge and pioneering a path that no one has yet taken,​
game.contents5: we will continue to pour our efforts into leading the motorsports world.
